prompts: Create a flying-type Pokemon with dark purple scales and sharp spikes along its back.
Imagine a prehistoric dragon Pokemon that soars above mountains with incredible speed.
Show me a fierce Pokemon that has a fierce gaze and a menacing grin.
Generate a creature that combines the traits of a bat and a dinosaur.
Design a Pokemon that can thrive in both urban environments and ancient caves.
Make a creature that has a large wingspan and agile movements in the air.
Give me a Pokemon that embodies speed and agility, perfect for aerial battles.
